result.longName: The Kuwait Company for Process Plant Construction and Contracting K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.address2: Near Shahrazad Round About Makhfar Street 30 P.O. Box: 3404
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: The Kuwait Company for Process Plant Construction and Contracting K.S.C.P. executes turnkey projects for building, civil engineering, and infrastructure projects in Kuwait. The company provides civil engineering services, including project and construction management, design, engineering, construction, and commissioning services for residential buildings, commercial and industrial buildings, shopping centers, and hotels; and flooring systems, water/fire proofing and roofing systems, rehabilitation and concrete repair structures, electro chemical treatments of structures, and corrosion services and solutions to various specialized industries. It also offers road and infrastructure services, such as road and highway construction projects, as well as related services comprising storm water drainage, sewer systems, water networks, telephone networks, and road marking and signs; drainage pipeline maintenance services; and electrical related products and supporting services. In addition, the company provides engineering products, including asphalt, polymer based bitumen, and ready mix concrete, as well as scaffolding services and equipment rental; and constructs, installs, and maintains water facilities, such as treatment plants for drinking water for homes and large buildings, swimming pools, water features, and spa facilities. Further, it supplies and installs passenger and freight elevators, escalators, moving walks, dumbwaiters, and elevators for the physically challenged; and distributes marble and natural stone products and services. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
